sect1.title: JAMSSpatialContext
sect1.subtitle: A component for iterating in space.

sect2.title: Component Description
sect2.para: This component can be used to represent space in JAMS models. Based on a list of spatial model entities (entities) it executes all of its child components/contexts once for every entity. An example of a spatial context which is nested within a temporal context is shown in . While iterating over the list of entities, JAMSSpatialContext allows its child components/contexts to access the current entity's attribute values. The method getCurrent() of the attribute entities can be used to access the current model entity during the spatial iteration. For details on how to exchange data via contexts and how to access entity attributes of spatial contexts please refer to the JAMS documentation. Spatial context nested inside of a temporal context
